name: Antisnake
description:
Tired of the usual snake, which increases in size and unrealistically accelerated?
It's time to try out Antisnake - a game in which you have to help the snake lose weight and lose excess pixels!

* Simulator of a diet from a snake face
* Hardcore gameplay in the traditions of the games of the 90's
* 27 different game modes for which you do not have enough time, and a lot more to develop
* Cooperative and PvP. Lose weight with your friends or against them!
* Sports mini-games: football and volleyball.
